title: Christina Aguilera channels Morticia The Addams Family premiere
text:
The spookiest family around (Picture: REX, Getty)

Christina Aguilera channelled Morticia on the purple carpet of The Addams Family premiere in Los Angeles.

The 38-year-old arrived with the whole family in tow but it seemed like she was the only one to go with the theme.

Fiancé Matthew Rutler, and children Max, 11, and Sumer, five, all posed before heading in to watch the animated update of the classic movie.

Morticia Addams would be quaking in her boots if she saw Christina’s short bangs and floor-length black dress.

The Genie In A Bottle singer sung a new song, Haunted Heart, for the new movie and we are in love.

Charlize Theron, Snoop Dogg, and Finn Wolfhard – who all-star in the movie – were also present at the premiere.

Snoog Dogg plays Cousin Itt and no, we still don’t understand it.

Killing it (Picture: WireImage)

Charlize voices Morticia in the reboot, alongside Oscar Isaac as husband Gomez and Chloe Grace as daughter Wednesday.

The movies sees the group of oddballs attempting to adapt to their new life in the US after moving from abroad.

Needless to say, the new animated movie is a lot different than the 1991 film we all fell in love with, but we’re all excited to see it.

It’s babies in spooky outfits season (Picture: Amy Sussman/FilmMagic)

Charlize steered away from Halloween themes (Picture: Matt Baron/REX)

It looks like Xtina is here to slay every event and performance and proved it during her performance for 31 Nights Of Halloween.

She had us all stunned with a gothic version of her Candyman look, wearing all black with a smoky eye along with her classic red lipstick.

All in an evening’s work, Xtina?

Vanessa Hudgens has her work cut out for her if she wants to keep her crown as the Queen of Halloween.

The Addams Family premieres on 11 October everywhere.
